item.title: US military says five killed in latest strike on alleged drug boats
item.description: The latest strike comes as the US Coast Guard searches for survivors of another that happened a day earlier.

item.title: Stranger Things draws to an epic and emotional close
item.description: Fans gathered at premieres in cities across the US and Canada to watch the finale on the big screen.

item.title: BBC reports from the scene of Swiss resort bar fire
item.description: Dozens of people are believed to have died after a fire broke out during New Year's Eve celebrations.

item.title: Iran security force member killed during protests, official says
item.description: A currency collapse has led to protests breaking out across the country, with unrest reported in several cities.

item.title: Watch: Historic Amsterdam church engulfed by fire on New Year's Eve
item.description: The blaze was thought to have started just after midnight and was swiftly declared a major fire
